EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_GET Partner Newsletter_2018.August 2018 GET Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform - A Guide for Partners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Are you interested in making the most of your time at Spring One Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]>? Please join our Pivotal Marketing team in this partner exclusive webinar! Whether you're sponsoring or just attending, we're going to help you make the most of your time in Washington DC.
We'll be covering:
- How to make your session the crowd favorite
- Setting up Technical Briefings with Pivotal R&D
- Making the most of your booth
- Spending time with prospects and customers
- Connecting with the Pivotal field team for your region
Looking forward to seeing you there!
Date: Tuesday, August 21 Time: 10PM PST
Thanks, The Pivotal Global Ecosystem Team Register here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/webinars-events.aspx]]>
